title: 1886-1890 Goodwin&Co. OLD JUDGE 495 page hardbound SOLD!
author: tbob

posts.post_title: 1886-1890 Goodwin&Co. OLD JUDGE 495 page hardbound SOLD!
posts.post_content:
In Near Mint condition. Originally $125, any pre-1900 card collector should have one. Price includes shipping. First email gets it.
[url]trophybob@sbcglobal.net[/url]
I have my copy will never sell:)
Just bought a brand new one off feebay. Can't wait to read it!
